references.reason: This paper introduced the DP-SGD algorithm, which is the central focus of the auditing techniques discussed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Membership Inference Attacks against Machine Learning Models
references.reason: This foundational paper introduced membership inference attacks (MIAs), which are used as a benchmark for evaluating the privacy guarantees of DP-SGD.

references.paper_title: Auditing Differentially Private Machine Learning: How Private is Private SGD?
references.reason: This paper is among the first to explore auditing methods for DP-SGD, providing a basis for the tighter auditing techniques presented in the current work.

references.paper_title: Tight Auditing of Differentially Private Machine Learning
references.reason: This paper significantly advanced the state-of-the-art in DP-SGD auditing, providing a direct comparison for the new techniques discussed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Unlocking High-Accuracy Differentially Private Image Classification through Scale
references.reason: This paper demonstrates high-utility DP-SGD models, which are used as a basis for evaluating the effectiveness of the auditing techniques in realistic settings.
